title.value: Perfection of soft drink reception based on potato concentrate
Совершенствование способа получения безалкогольного напитка на основе картофельного концентрата

subject.value: produit aa base de pomme de terre

person.name: Litvyak, V.V., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Foodstuffs
Pozdnyakov, V.M., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Lisovskaya, D.P., Belarus Trade and Economic Univ. of Consumer Cooperation, Gomel (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented a study into improvement of a way of reception of soft drink on the basis of a potato (Solanum tuberosum) concentrate. The offered way of reception of soft drink on the basis of a potato concentrate will allow to raise essentially its consumer properties that will increase its competitiveness in comparison with other drinks. The study provides a method of producing a soft drink based on potato concentrate, comprising the following sequentially implemented technological operations: water treatment (filtration, biological treatment, iron removal, softening); preparation of potato concentrate, blended cooking ingredients (sugar syrup, sugar caramel, aromatic raw materials, citric acid); blending; filtering blending and bottling; packaging. To reduce the number of hydroxymethyl furfural the drink based potato concentrate is mixed with juices, nectars or fruit infusions in different proportions.
